references.reason: This paper introduced denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a foundational model for many visual generative models and a key component of the CFG method discussed in the paper.
This paper introduced classifier-free guidance (CFG), a key technique that the paper aims to improve upon by reducing computational cost while maintaining performance.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduced a high-resolution image synthesis model that is used as a baseline in several experiments in the paper.
This paper introduced an influential autoregressive model architecture, which is relevant to the paper's discussion of various visual generative models.

references.paper_title: On distillation of guided diffusion models
references.reason: This paper proposed a guidance distillation method, which is compared with the approach presented in this paper.
